snippet.title: Bacon May Die - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Join the mortal combat with Bacon May Die - insanely fun fighting game, where a little pig warrior must face hordes of bacon hungry zombie bunnies and battle evil creatures of the forest for its survival. This beat em up game lets you fight like a ninja hero using crazy melee weapons with an option to spice up the action by slowing time and raining bullets on your enemies in cool shooting mode, which will make you feel like an action movie star.

Bacon May Die (C) SnoutUp
Also on iOS and Android

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #snoutup #baconmaydie #indie #indiegame #indiegames
